name: Girls Nightgown style 0659
description:
This adorable old fashioned gown made with soft cotton fabric in your choice of white or cream. 

The nightgown was designed with a very full gathered skirt falling from the laced trimmed yoke, sleeve length in your choice of long or short sleeves.

The bottom of the gown is finished with a deep flounce ruffle. 

 The bodice crosses over in a kimono style at the front to make dressing easy and closes in the back with ribbon ties at the top. 

This is the sweetest little old fashioned gown you'll find.

name: Child's Apron and Mop Cap
description:
Whether you need this for a program or just for fun, the little girl in your life will enjoy her new bonnet and apron like The Ingall girls wore.

This also has a colonial look to it much like what Felicity from American Girls would have worn.

Made from your choice or white, cream or black cotton fabric.

name: Child's Apron and Bonnet
description:
Whether you need this for a program or just for fun, the little girl in your life will enjoy her new  bonnet and apron like The Ingall girls wore.

 This also has a colonial look to it much like what Felicity from American Girls would have worn.
  

Made from your choice or white, cream or black cotton fabric.

name: Ladies Apron and Bonnet
description:
Whether you need this for working around the house, a program or just for fun, you will enjoy your bonnet and apron.

Made from 100 % white, cream or black cotton fabric.

The apron is 30" long from the waist to the hem and the ties are each 32" long. 

The wide brim on the bonnet offers great protection from the sun.

name: Ladies Apron and Mop Cap
description:
Whether you need this for cooking at home, a program or just for fun, you will enjoy your mop cap and apron.

Made from 100 % white, cream, or black cotton fabric.

The apron is 30" long from the waist to the hem and the ties are each 32" long. 

The wide ruffled edge on the mop cap offers great protection from the sun or when worn to bed keeps your hair from getting tangled.

name: 2 pc Civil War. Pioneer, Victorian, Renaissance skirt with sash
description:
Have you ever felt like you should have been born in another era? Allow this dress to take you there, to a time when ladies sashayed through the flower gardens and relaxed at tea parties with friends. 

The skirt is made of 100% super soft Cotton fabric which is sure to bring back the feeling of a time you thought had escaped you. 

The bottom of the skirt is 115" around so it is full enough to fit over a hoop skirt but can be worn with out hoops as well. The skirt has a professional finished hem at 44". The waist has a 65" satin drawstring so it will fit almost anyone. 

The black cotton sash is 3.5 yards long, makes a great big bow in the back and is removable.

The vintage style blouse is not included.

This skirt can be worn without the sash for medieval/renaissance/SCA garb. All seams are serged/ finished to prevent fraying.

name: Birthday Baby Bib You pick the design
description:
Let your birthday boy or girl shine with their own personalized birthday bib. 

Baby boy designs are also available.

I have lots of fabrics available - let me if you are working with a specific theme or colors and I will work with you. All bibs have velcro neck closure.

I also offer matching birthday initial/number onesies and t-shirts. These make terrific gifts - who doesn't love to see their little one in personalized birthday attire? Makes for an awesome birthday photoshoot, too!

When ordering, please include any personalizing information you would like added and which design from the pictures you would like.

name: Chef Hat
description:
Features adjustable velcro closure for easy comfort. 

Offered in polyester/cotton lightweight poplin.

Personalizing is available for an additional $5.00

name: Bistro Apron
description:
Protect your clothes with the full-length coverage of this apron.

These aprons make great gifts for dad!

Available in white or black. Full aprons/bib aprons are also available.

Heavyweight 7.5-ounce, 65/35 poly/cotton twill for durability and easy care
Wraparound waist tie
Large rectangular pocket with pencil divider to keep everything at hand
Measures 28"w x 32"l

name: Cluny Lace Apron
description:
Cluny lace and Embroidery give a romantic look to our full length Apron.

 Made of 100% Cotton with Cluny lace and embroidered accents on bib front and skirt. 

Shoulder straps go all the way down the back and loop through waist band.

Monogramming is available on this item at no additional charge

name: Ladies Long Full Half Apron
description:
The ladies half apron is perfect for protecting your skirt or adding the finishing touches to your costume. 

Made from 100 % white, cream or black cotton fabric that is machine washable and dryer safe.

The apron is 30" long from the waist to the hem and the ties are each 32" long.

name: Pinafore Apron, Calico Fabric
description:
This pinafore apron features a full skirt gathered at the waist onto a sash and has a bib that is ruffled at the shoulders. 

The apron wraps all the way around the body and ties in the back with enough room to form a beautiful full bow. 

This apron will be made up to 26 inches long and of calico cotton fabric. 

Monogramming is available on this item.

name: Pinafore Apron
description:
This pinafore apron features a full skirt gathered at the waist onto a sash and has a bib that is ruffled at the shoulders. 

The apron wraps all the way around the body and ties in the back with enough room to form a beautiful full bow. 

This apron will be made up to 26 inches long and of white cotton fabric.

Monogramming is available on this item.

name: Battenberg Lace Bib Apron
description:
Battenberg lace and Embroidery give a romantic look to our full length Apron. Made of 100% Cotton with Battenberg lace and embroidered accents on bib front, pocket and hem. Shoulder straps go all the way down the back and button to waist band.


Apron skirt measures 34 inches wide by 27 inches long

Monogramming is available on this item.

name: Victorian skirt with sash
description:
Have you ever felt like you should have been born in another era? Allow this dress to take you there, to a time when ladies sashayed through the flower gardens and relaxed at tea parties with friends. 

The skirt is made of soft  floral Cotton fabric which is sure to bring back the feeling of a time you thought had escaped you. 

The bottom of the skirt is 115" around so it is full enough to fit over a hoop skirt but can be worn with out hoops as well. The skirt has a professional finished hem at 44". The waist has a 65" satin drawstring so it will fit almost anyone. 

The navy blue cotton sash is 3.5 yards long, makes a great big bow in the back and is removable and can be switched out at no additional charge with another color.

The vintage style blouse is not included.

This skirt can be worn without the sash for medieval/renaissance/SCA garb. All seams are serged/ finished to prevent fraying.

name: Pinafore Apron, Pantaloons and Mop Cap
description:
This over the head pinafore apron set is adorable!

The pinafore apron has ruffled sleeves and is gathered for fullness at the waist. 

The bodice is fully lined for a clean finish and all seams are serged for comfort and durability.

It closes on the sides with ribbon and is available in solid white, cream, pink, lavender, pale yellow and baby blue.

The pantaloons have a wide leg and ruffled hem. The waist is elastic to make dressing easy. 

The mop cap adds the perfect touch for protecting your little one's delicate skin and for cute pictures. 

This set is perfect for photos, dress up, plays and costumes such as Little Miss Muffet or the baby on Little House on the Prairie.

name: Pioneer Skirt and Bonnet Set
description:
The special little girls in your life will enjoy acting out pioneer history in her own Laura Ingalls Wilder bonnet and skirt. This set is also very similar to what Kirsten from the American girls series would have worn.

The set includes a skirt and matching bonnet. Apron, pantaloons and other period items are sold in our store.

name: Infants Mop Cap
description:
Your little one will look adorable in this mop cap! Perfect for photos. Made from 100 % white, cream or pink cotton fabric. The cap will fit most infants newborn to 12 months
An infants lace trimmed mop cap is also available as are larger sizes.

name: Mop Cap, Sleeping Cap
description:
This Colonial Mob Cap is a must have for every colonial woman or girl. The cap is also perfect for Little Miss Muffet, French maid, housekeeper and Mrs Clause costumes. 

The cap is reversible and made from soft cotton fabric.

name: Girls Slip or Petticoat
description:
A  cotton petticoat slip is an essential item in every girl's wardrobe. It provides modesty and comfort. 

The ruffled edge on this cotton petticoat looks especially nice peeking out from under a pioneer skirt.

Made in 100% cotton cream or white fabric that is lightweight and breathes. 

Elastic  non-roll waistband.

name: Little House on the Prairie Historical Night Gown
description:
This adorable old fashioned gown made with soft cotton fabric in your choice of white or cream. 

The nightgown was designed with a very full gathered skirt falling from the laced trimmed yoke, sleeve length in your choice of long or short sleeves. 

The bottom of the gown is finished with a deep flounce ruffle. 

The gown has a v opening at the front that is adorned with a bow to make dressing easy and closes in the back with ribbon ties at the top. 

This is the sweetest little old fashioned gown you'll find. The mop cap is not included but can be purchased in our shop.

name: Pantaloons, knickers or bloomers with eyelet lace trim
description:
Lace Edged Bloomers bring the cutest retro charm to your little girl!

Soft cotton with covered elastic waist and legs edged in sweet eyelet lace look so adorable peeking out from under a dress! A stylish way to cover up a diaper and provide the finishing touch to your little one's outfit. 

                             Available in White. 100% Cotton. 

                              Sized newborn to 24 months

name: Infants Lace Trimmed Mop Cap
description:
Your little one will look adorable in this lace trimmed mop cap! Perfect for photos, dress up, costumes or to keep the sun of your little one's delicate skin. 

Made from 100 % cotton fabric and trimmed with matching lace. The mop cap is fully lined so elastic will never touch your little one's skin. 

If you would like a bow added to the cap please specify it in the note to seller section.

name: Over the Head Pinafore Apron
description:
This over the head pinafore apron is adorable!

The pinafore apron has ruffled sleeves and is gathered for fullness at the waist. The bodice is fully lined for a clean finish and all seams are serged for comfort and durability. It closes on the sides with ribbon and is available in solid white, cream, pink, lavender, pale yellow and baby blue.


Sizes available include 3 months up to 6X.

Mop cap is not included but can be purchased in our shop separately or in sets.

Monogramming is available on this item.

name: Bib Apron
description:
This ladies bib apron is perfect for cooking, cleaning, adding the finishing touch to a costume or simply for everyday wear to protect your clothing. The bib section will cover most of your blouse. 

Made in choice of white or cream fabric.

Monogramming is available on this item.
